entry.title: Frozen Lines
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 112,772Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 101

Summary: The ice was his sanctuary. His home.But outside the rink, everything was war.Stiles carried a past full of pain—silent wounds no one could see. And Derek, the unyielding captain of the basketball team, was the last person he wanted to face.Enemies bound by pride, secrets, and unspoken grudges.In a town where trust shatters like thin ice, their collision is inevitable.Can two broken souls break down the walls between them? Or will the fight destroy everything, including what they never expected to find: each other?The ice will always be his sanctuary. But maybe, for the first time, the battle is worth fighting off the rink.

entry.title: Echoes of a Shattered Winter
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,972Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Ice keeps no memories. But Stiles carries them all.The falls on the cold, unforgiving rink.The voices that whisper even in empty halls.The marks on his body and soul that refuse to fade. He learned early that perfection comes at a price.That silence can be crueler than screams.That every practiced move, every forced smile, is a shield against a world that never stopped judging. Derek Hale is everything he should avoid.Captain of the football team.Popular. Untouchable.A face that sparks rage, defiance, and, against his own will, a strange pull he cannot explain. In Beacon Hills, every glance weighs heavy.Every whisper lingers.And sometimes, it’s impossible to escape.From the past.From desire.From the shadows that live in your own skin.

entry.title: A Sense of Deja Vú
entry.summary:
Author: Chaos_Crew

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,978Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 56

Summary: Seventeen years ago the Hale Pack of Beacon Hills disappears without a trace after a house fire leaving the town to believe they had all suffered the same fate as the family fifteen years prior. Hearing the news of the house fire along with the weird accounts of "freak accidents" the Winchesters and Co. head to Beacon Hills to investigate. A few hours shortly after arriving a dog with to much human like qualities leads Dean to a baby abandoned in an alley. Seventeen years later that baby has grown a lot and is starting to witness the oddities of the towns supernatural accidently ending up back in time to the point where the Hale Pack is starting to find their footing after years of butting heads.

entry.title: Keystone Species
entry.summary:
Author: SpaceflowerGrace

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,044Chapters: 7/10Kudos: 73

Summary: They didn't talk much about why Stiles was back in town. His mother had been inordinately proud of that fact she went into labor and delivered Stiles alone in the woods. It was the eighties, she couldn’t exactly call her husband on her cell phone. Stiles was born healthy in the preserve. Scott got hurt. Scott is Stiles to protect. He always has been. Stiles is pissed about quite a few things. “Scott is my fifteen year old cousin! And you hurt him and then left him alone and hurt? What’s wrong with you?” He has gotten very close to Derek’s face. Stiles takes a breath and turns away. Or- what if Stiles was the responsible adult at home?

entry.title: begin your journey and do not skip ahead
entry.summary:
Author: spoilerfreak

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,500Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 178

Summary: The first page greets him with a polaroid: Stiles, disheveled and grinning tiredly, perched on his suitcase in the living room. Beside it in marker block letters: BEGIN YOUR JOURNEY. DO NOT SKIP AHEAD. Derek scowls at the page, tempted to flip straight to the back. But in the corner in tiny letters: Yes, you can turn the page today. With a huff, he does. The next page has the present date and a short message: Here we are on the first day of me gone. I am on my way to get properly educated and you are on your way to find a treasure chest. Wipe that frown off your face, Sourwolf. We are both beginning an adventure, so put on something comfortable and pack a change of underwear. There’s an actual treasure map taped to the page. --- What if Stiles leaves for college and Derek decides to stay in Beacon Hills. What if Stiles leaves Derek with a journal entry for every day. An instruction manual. What if Derek follows it and rebuilds his life, page by page.
